 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==pound, pound fine, bray== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּתַשׁ‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***strive, contend***; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כתש‎</span> ***break in pieces, shatter***, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Sendsch. 58</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִםתִּֿכְתּוֺשׁ אֶתהָֿאֱוִיל בַּמַּכְתֵּשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.27.22|Prov 27:22]] ***if thou shouldest bray the fool in the mortar.***
